Posts.Content: I’m so glad I stumbled upon this thread today. I had my first FEC chemo yesterday and despite loads of anti nausea meds’ I’m struggling to drink. It’s almost like my throat just closes up and I can’t stomach the thought of it. I have a dehydration headache so am going to send my partner out for milkshake, ginger beer and lots of ice as your comments made me remember the super cold thing helped when I had hyperemesis in pregnancy.  Look after yourselves x
Posts.Title: Struggling to drink recommended fluids after chemotherapy!
